title.narrative: Community and Legislative members Interactive Platform (CLIP) Project

description.narrative:
In climes where true Democracy is practiced according to its tenets; which are Good Governance, Inclusive participation, Accountability, Transparency and Government responsiveness amongst others, great importance and value is placed on the essence of a cordial relationship amongst citizens and their representatives - this relationship is not been well harnessed by the citizens of Anambra State as evident in the disconnection of the consents, appropriations, representations, oversights and lawmaking duties of the House of Assembly members to the residents of the State, just as obtainable in most states of the nation.
JDPC Awka through being gender and religious sensitive shall work with “CLIP Community Vanguards”- a composition of Eight (8) persons each from the twelve constituencies of the targeted local government areas and twenty-four (24) volunteers of Community Based Monitors (CBMs) from a Voice to the People (V2P) project for seamless operation in their respective LGAs. Justice Development and Peace Caritas [JDPC] Awka shall create a platform; “Community and Legislative members Interactive Platform Clinic” (CLIP Clinic) where activities like Legislative Advocacy to Legislators, Roundtable discussions involving the legislators and the Community vanguards can be organized to provide solutions to community issues. Also a capacity building exercise for the community vanguards shall be held to support them in the development of Socio-economic and political legislative plans to present to their legislators. Finally, a Town Hall meeting of the targeted Local Government community stakeholders, the community vanguards and their Legislators shall be organized in order for the community members to discuss with their Legislators on issues plaguing the communities and proffer sustaining solutions to them.
